message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for a product of this quality.  How about we meet halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me there?
